job.title: Python / Machine Learning Software Engineer
job.description: LinkSquares is a fast growing, Series-B funded AI-driven legal-tech company. We are looking for smart, friendly, and dedicated software and machine learning engineers to help build and maintain our ML pipelines. As a software engineer working within the Data Science team at LinkSquares, you will productionize, deploy, and maintain machine learning systems that help our customers understand their contracts. You will work with a wide range of structured and unstructured data sources. You will design and build customized, large-scale cloud-based machine learning systems. You will have a close relationship with our Product Managers and UX Designers, collaborating in a small-team environment. LinkSquares is a high growth start-up company with an established customer base. As the company grows, the opportunity for you to grow professionally will come at an accelerated pace! We offer an outstanding benefits package to include comprehensive health and dental, unlimited vacation and the best company swag on the block. Lastly, not only will there be ample opportunity to grow professionally but you will also be rewarded for the value that you create through your stock options.
